name: QuotableMovieQuoteQuiz
0:
”Alexa, open quotable movie quiz”
”Alexa, start quotable movie quiz”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quotable movie quiz
des:
Alexa will play quotes from famous movie characters. You name the movie character who said each quote. Each correct answer includes a fact about the movie. If the character was known by 2 names such as Batman and Bruce Wayne. State the name of the form they appeared as when they said the quote. Generally, last names should not be included in answers except when they are well known such as Indiana Jones.

 While playing the quiz, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next quote. At any point, you can say "Alexa stop" to exit the quiz.

 This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.

If you have any issues, questions, or comments, please leave feedback.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
